name: SHAPERUSH!
description:
SHAPERUSH! is a simple game about changing shape, world, and atmosphere.

A submission for Raion HackJam 2021

Team Member:

Muhammad Haikal Fisabilillah - Game Designer

Muhammad Firmansyah Putra - Game Programmer

Amanda Vania Audrey - Game Artist

Aldino Titteo Rikardo - Game Artist
